title: Video2X 2.10.0 release - Anime 4k Bug
body:
## Environment Information
windows 10 pro

## Symptom

When using Anime4k as a driver program gets stuck on up scaling process. No gpu or cpu use regardless of which method is chosen. CPU, GPU, and CUDNN all don't work. I've also tried 1 to 3 threads of each option. Scale was 2, image format png, and perserved frames 1 for each test. 

waifu2x-caffe seems to work as expected.

Also the default output file generated uses \ not / (see image) manually changing this to / didn't seem to fix anything.


##Steps taken before testing
unzip video2x-2.10.0-win32-light

run video2x_setup.exe

run video2x_gui.exe (initiate testing)

## Screenshots or Error Messages

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32424764/65824837-e6363600-e234-11e9-81da-2fe4b8cf5602.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32424764/65824991-00711380-e237-11e9-8ec4-dd97577e9d8f.png)


## My video2x.json file

